summary: The diff updates `frontend/public/env.json` with a non-placeholder `BACKEND_CANISTER_ID`, but there is no verifiable evidence of deploying a new backend canister or rerunning/completing the full go-live deploy flow. The diff also includes additional code and metadata changes (backend + preflight logic + project state summaries) that were not requested and conflict with the “do not change anything else than necessary” constraint.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy a NEW backend canister (new canister ID) and record the newly created backend canister ID for use by the frontend configuration.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows code changes to `backend/main.mo` but does not show any deployment artifacts, canister creation logs, dfx configuration updates, or other evidence that a new canister was actually created/deployed and that its new ID was captured as part of the deployment process.

missing_requirements.requirement: Run the go-live build + deploy flow again after updating `frontend/public/env.json` and ensure it completes successfully without deployment errors.
missing_requirements.reason: There is no evidence in the diff of running the go-live flow, its outputs, CI logs, or any deployment success indicators. Code changes alone do not demonstrate that the end-to-end flow completed successfully.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded/modified preflight validation logic for BACKEND_CANISTER_ID (normalization and additional placeholder checks).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-92 only asked to update `frontend/public/env.json` to a real canister ID so the existing preflight check no longer fails; it did not request changing `runPreflightChecks` logic.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend Motoko source changes unrelated to deployment/configuration (large modifications within `backend/main.mo`).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest constrained changes to only what is necessary for deploying a new backend canister and updating `env.json`; backend feature/source changes were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state updates not required for deploying a new canister or updating `env.json` (e.g., `project_state.json`, `frontend-file-summaries.txt`).
hallucinated_features.reason: These files are not mentioned in the requirements and appear unrelated to the minimal deployment/configuration scope.
